articles.title: Dozens presumed dead and about 100 injured in fire at Swiss Alps bar during New Year’s celebration
articles.description: Dozens of people are presumed dead and about 100 injured, most of them seriously, following a fire at a bar in a Swiss Alps resort town during a New Year’s celebration, police said Thursday.
